casebody.data:
NEWBERNE
v.
CRIME CONTROL, et al. No. 75A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 19, 2005. J. Heydt Philbeck, Raleigh, for Reginald Newberne. Donald K. Phillips, Assistant Attorney General, for Dept. of Crime Control, et al. Mark A. Davis, Raleigh, for Asso. of County Commissioners. J. Michael McGuinness, Elizabethtown, for NC Troopers Association. Luke Largess, Charlotte, for NC Academy of Trial Lawyers & AC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of April 2005 by State Employees Association of NC, Inc. for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief and Motion for Extension of Time:

"Motion Allowed. State Employees Association of NC, Inc. shall have up to and including the 18th day of April to file his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 19th day of April 2005."
